name: ANGEL SPIRIT
description:
ANGEL SPIRIT is a first-person retro-inspired 3D platforming/adventure game, taking place in a fantasy world comprised of 10 unique levels.

Experience the world through the eyes of an angel, summoned to embark on a quest for magical abilities.

This game offer a uniquely tranquil experience for those who appreciate exploring interactive realms.

The gameplay is very simple. You walk/run through each level, with the main content being the atmospheric immersion that each environment provides.

There is a non-trivial amount of first-person 3D platforming to enhance the gaming experience, along with an auditorily polished, highly satisfying UI/UX.

The priority audience are those who enjoy games that focus on immersing the player into atmospheric landscapes and environments.

Short in duration, the game hopes that the player enjoys their time by soaking in the atmosphere of each level, appreciating the innermost complexes of the mind that are stimulated with the simplistic visual and auditory input.

For those with advice or suggestion on how to improve both this and future games, please leave your advice and input in the community forums.

- OP37K
